response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $800,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the significant benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $750,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure a high-value asset at a reduced cost. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to discuss how this product can enhance your business or personal endeavors.", "product_price": 750000}
